short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A new tab extension for constant updates on how bad COVID-19 is in your country.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Keep track of how bad COVID-19 is across the world. All data is sourced from Johns Hopkins University.

You can select up to 3 countries to keep track of, every time you open a new tab you can check the numbers. 

When you install "How bad is it?", you'll be taken to a page where you can choose the countries you want to monitor. Every time you open a new tab, you'll be able to see the newest numbers in the countries you have selected. 

There is also a web version if you don't want to install a Chrome extension. Visit http://www.howbadisit.live/
